ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer

Class Aggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer.Aggregator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAggregator

    public class Aggregator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAggregator
    Combines scores from 2 dimensional array into one and ranks sentences accordingly. Simple linear addition is used. Any sentences receiving individual negative scores are discounted completely.
    Author:
    Shane
